music.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices in a way that is pleasant or exciting
music.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: I often listen to classical music when I’m in the car.
A new piece of music was specially written for the occasion.
music.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: the art of writing or playing music
music.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: a career in the music business
music.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a set of written marks representing music, or paper with the written marks on it
music.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: I left my music at home.
McCartney never learned to read music.
music.translation[0].note_box[0].section: Ella was listening to music on her iPod.
A small band was playing jazz music.
He composed the music for the ‘Lord of the Rings’ films.
We began making music together about five years ago.
They were kept awake by loud music from next door.
Johnny Cash was one of country music’s greatest stars.
Most of the bars have live music.
Live music can sound very different from recorded music.
the soft background music in the restaurant
We perform a wide variety of choral music.
a performance of Schumann’s chamber music
He has a large CD collection, mostly orchestral music.
I love listening to piano music.
For music lovers, the city has two world-famous orchestras.
It’s a beautiful piece of music.
music.translation[0].note_box[1].section: the sounds made by musical instruments or people singing
The music was really loud.
tune
the main series of musical notes in a piece of music
a folk song with a pretty tune
melody
the main series of notes in a piece of music that has many notes being played at the same time, especially in classical music
The soprano sang the melody.
harmony
the chords or notes in a piece of music that support the melody
the rich harmonies in the symphony
an arrangement of musical notes – use this about music without words
It’s a difficult piece to play.
composition
a piece of music that someone has written
This is one of his own compositions.
a piece of music, especially classical music
one of Mozart’s best-known works
track
one of the songs or pieces of music on a CD
the album’s title track
a piece of popular music that forms part of a concert or show
the show’s first number
